muteru.subtitle: Web Application for Tourism
muteru.description: Muteru is an application for travelers interested in fortune-telling and spirituality through travel routes, enhancing love and faith. No matter the route, Muteru will help boost your luck for success in your career, finances, and personal life.

frontend.bullet1: Developed the website's user interface based on Figma designs.
frontend.bullet2: Used Three.js to create a 3D game on the website.
frontend.bullet3: Used Phaser.js to create a 2D game on the website.
frontend.bullet5: Created a system for language and font switching.
frontend.bullet6: Developed a Backoffice dashboard for Staff and Admin.

backend.bullet3: Designed data storage to support scalability and user activity tracking.
backend.bullet4: Created Firebase APIs for sending data to the frontend.
backend.bullet5: Developed an authentication system for third-party logins.
backend.bullet6: Managed API calls to other project applications.
backend.bullet7: Created a token system for rewarding users.

other.title: Other
other.bullet1: Presented and participated in meetings with other teams to discuss API development.
other.bullet2: Conducted user testing to identify and resolve issues.

net-zero.subtitle: Web Application for Carbon Footprint Visualization
net-zero.description: Net Zero is a web application that displays carbon usage data at Chiang Mai University. The data is categorized by faculty and location within the university. The website features a dashboard and 3D map visualization.

frontend.bullet1: Developed the website's user interface based on Figma designs.
frontend.bullet3: Rearranged data from JSON files for presentation.
frontend.bullet4: Created a system for language and font switching.
frontend.bullet5: Developed a Backoffice dashboard for Admin.

backend.bullet3: Used Firebase Cloud Functions and Realtime to retrieve data from other databases.
backend.bullet4: Created Firebase APIs for sending data to the frontend.
backend.bullet5: Developed a system for sending emails to users in case of abnormal data readings.

portfolio.subtitle: Web Application for showcasing portfolio
portfolio.description: A web application for showcasing work, developed with Next.js to support increased SEO. It allows for language and theme changes as desired.
